seo.title: Mehdi Dias Gomes - Full-Stack Developer | Devaura
seo.description: Full-stack developer specialized in Vue.js, Nuxt.js, Laravel and TypeScript. I create modern, high-performance and custom web applications.

header.title: I Build
header.description: Passionate full-stack developer, I create modern and performant web applications

landing.tagline: I support startups and SMEs in building their web applications
landing.description: Fullstack developer specialized in Nuxt.js & Laravel. I quickly transform your ideas into modern web applications: showcase sites, SaaS, custom interfaces. Up-to-date tech stack, fast delivery, and I remain available after launch. Based in Metz, I work with startups and SMEs that want to move fast.

about.subTitle: Full Stack Developer
about.firstParagraph: Mehdi DIAS GOMES, Full Stack Developer, Metz
about.secondParagraph: Graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Full Stack Web Development from Metz Numeric School, I am passionate about web development. I have developed practical expertise in full stack development and gained significant experience through various professional projects.
about.collaborateDescription: I'm always open to new opportunities and exciting projects. Feel free to reach out!

firstInList.parag: Internal website development and maintenance. Managing technical infrastructure and continuous platform improvement.
Complete redesign of the "Fiches pédagogiques" website (front-end). Developed the responsive user interface and back-office from scratch, with backend API integration.
firstInList.technos: Nuxt.js 3, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Laravel (Eloquent), MySQL, Docker

secondInList.parag: Added features to a PIM (Product Information Management) – improved the product form (filters, new fields for watches). Developed dynamic filters and custom fields for data entry on the front-end.

mns.title: Metz Numeric School
mns.subTitle: Bachelor's in Full Stack Development
mns.parag: Specialized training in web and application development, combining skills in front-end, back-end, and database management. Gained technical expertise in technologies such as TypeScript, PHP, and MySQL, and developed practical skills through hands-on projects, preparing me for a career as a full-stack developer.

labriquerie.title: LPO La Briquerie
labriquerie.subTitle: BTS Digital Systems (SNIR)
labriquerie.parag: Training focused on embedded systems, networks, and software development. Learned the fundamentals of electronics, programming (C/C++, Python), and network administration. Developed a comprehensive understanding of hardware and software architectures, with a technical and rigorous approach to digital systems.
